card.name: The One Ring
card.property: While wearing The One Ring, the Ring-bearer is strength +2, and each time he is about to take a wound in a skirmish, add a burden instead. Skirmish: Add a burden to wear The One Ring until the regroup phase.
”'…thought to have perished from the world.'”

card.name: The One Ring
card.property: While wearing The One Ring, the Ring-bearer is strength +2, and each time he is about to take a wound in a skirmish, add a burden instead. Skirmish: Add a burden to wear The One Ring until the regroup phase.
”'…thought to have perished from the world.'”

card.name: The One Ring
card.property: Response: If bearer is about to take a wound in a skirmish, he wears The One Ring until the regroup phase. While wearing The One Ring, each time the Ring-bearer is about to take a wound during a skirmish, add a burden instead.
“One Ring to rule them all….”

card.name: Anger
card.property: Skirmish: Spot 3 [Dunland] minions or a site you control to make a [Dunland] Man fierce until the regroup phase.
Rage filled the hearts of the Dunlending attackers.

card.name: Band of Wild Men
card.property: Each time this minion wins a skirmish, you may make it fierce until the regroup phase.

card.name: Burn Every Village
card.property: Skirmish: Make a [Dunland] Man strength +2 (or +4 if you control a site).
”'Take your rabble through the Westemnet; take back the lands they stole from you.'”

card.name: Constantly Threatening
card.property: Plays to your support area. Shadow: If the fellowship has moved more than once this turn, remove (2) to play a [Dunland] Man from your discard pile.
The men of Dunland have hated the Rohirrim for many years.

card.name: Dark Fury
card.property: Skirmish: Make a [Dunland] Man strength +2 (or +4 if at a sanctuary).
“Dunland and Dunlendings are the names that the Rohirrim gave to them, because they were swarthy and dark-haired….”

card.name: Death to the Strawheads
card.property: Skirmish: Make a [Dunland] Man strength +1 for each companion you spot.
The dark Dunlendings called their fairhaired enemies from Rohan “Strawheads.”

card.name: Dunlending Arsonist
card.property: Each time this minion wins a skirmish, you may play a [Dunland] Man from hand; his twilight cost is -2. That Man is fierce and damage +1 until the regroup phase.
”'They bring fire… and they are burning as they come, rick, cot, and tree.'”

card.name: Dunlending Brigand
card.property: ”'This was a rich vale and had many homesteads. Alas for my folk!'”

card.name: Dunlending Looter
card.property: When this minion wins a skirmish, you may stack him on a site you control. Shadow: If stacked on a site you control, play this minion. His twilight cost is -2.
”…the Dunlendings raided often over the Isen.”

card.name: Dunlending Madman
card.property: Each time this minion wins a skirmish, you may make him strength +2 and fierce until the regroup phase.
”'They hate us, and they are glad; for our doom seems certain to them.'”

card.name: Dunlending Pillager
card.property: Each time this minion wins a skirmish, you may discard a Free Peoples possession (or 2 possessions if you spot 6 companions).
”'Not in half a thousand years have they forgotten their grievance that the lords of Gondor gave the Mark to Eorl the Young and made alliance with him.'”

card.name: Dunlending Ransacker
card.property: Each time this minion wins a skirmish, you may spot another [Dunland] Man to take control of a site.
”'Yet there are many that cry in the Dunland tongue.'”

card.name: Dunlending Ravager
card.property: While skirmishing a [Rohan] Man, this minion is strength +2. Assignment: Spot an ally to make that ally participate in skirmishes and assign this minion to skirmish that ally.

card.name: Dunlending Robber
card.property: Each time this minion wins a skirmish, you may make him strength +2 and fierce until the regroup phase.
”'We will fight….'”

card.name: Dunlending Savage
card.property: The Dunlendings' fury could only end in the death of the king of Rohan.

card.name: Dunlending Warrior
card.property: Assignment: Spot an ally to make that ally participate in skirmishes and assign this minion to skirmish that ally.
“These were a remnant of the peoples that had dwelt in the vales of the White Mountains in ages past.”

card.name: Hides
card.property: Plays to your support area. When you play this possession, you may draw a card. Response: If a [Dunland] Man is about to take a wound, remove (2) or discard this possession to prevent that wound.
Only heavy animal skins armored the Dunlendings.

card.name: Hides
card.property: When you play this possession, you may draw a card. Response: If a [Dunland] Man is about to take a wound, remove (2) or discard this possession to prevent that wound.
Only heavy animal skins armored the Dunlendings.

card.name: Hill Chief
card.property: Shadow: Spot a site you control and exert Hill Chief to draw 3 cards.
”'…Saruman has armed the wild hillmen and herdfolk of Dunland beyond the rivers, and these also he loosed upon us.'”

card.name: Hillman Band
card.property: Each time the fellowship moves, you may spot another [Dunland] Man to take control of a site.
As in years past, the Dunlendings marched in force to the west.

card.name: Hillman Horde
card.property: While you control 2 sites, skip the archery phase. While you control 3 sites, each of your [Dunland] Men is fierce. While you control 4 sites, each of your [Dunland] Men is damage +1.
”'They are fierce folk when roused.'”

card.name: Hillman Mob
card.property: Each time this minion wins a skirmish, you may play a [Dunland] Man from hand; his twilight cost is -2. That Man is fierce and damage +1 until the regroup phase.
”'That old hatred Saruman has inflamed.'”

card.name: Hillman Rabble
card.property: Each time this minion wins a skirmish, you may stack it on a site you control. Shadow: If stacked on a site you control, play this minion. Its twilight cost is -2.
The relentless fury of the Dunlendings consumed one village after another.

card.name: Hillman Tribe
card.property: Each time this minion wins a skirmish, you may spot another [Dunland] minion to take control of a site.
”'They will not quail at the sun… the wild men of the hills.'”

card.name: Iron Axe
card.property: Bearer must be a [Dunland] Man.
Saruman armed the Dunlendings with weapons forged by his Orcs in Isengard.

card.name: Living Off Rock
card.property: Plays to your support area. Each time a [Dunland] Man wins a skirmish involving a [Rohan] Man, you may make that minion strength +2 and fierce until the regroup phase.
”'The Horsemen took your land; they drove your people into the hills to scratch living off rock.'”

card.name: No Defense
card.property: Plays to your support area. Shadow: Remove (3) to place a [Dunland] token here. Skirmish: Spot a [Dunland] Man and remove a [Dunland] token from this card. A character skirmishing that [Dunland] Man does not gain strength bonuses from possessions.

card.name: No Refuge
card.property: Plays to your support area. While a [Dunland] Man is stacked on a site, the Shadow number of each site is +5.
As their homes were ravaged by the wild men, refugees fled to the safety of Helm's Deep.

card.name: No Retreat
card.property: Plays on a site you control. Regroup: Spot 2 [Dunland] Men and discard this condition to make the Free Peoples player choose to move again this turn (if the move limit allows).
Hordes from Dunland laid waste to villages as their numbers grew.

card.name: Over the Isen
card.property: Plays to your support area. Assignment: Spot a site you control and remove (2) to assign a [Dunland] Man to an unbound companion.
Like their ancestors years before, the Dunlendings came down from Isengard.

card.name: Ravage the Defeated
card.property: Response: If your [Dunland] Man wins a skirmish, discard all Free Peoples cards borne by the companion or ally he was skirmishing.
What the Dunlendings cannot steal, they destroy.

card.name: Saruman
card.property: Saruman may not be assigned to a skirmish. Each time the fellowship moves, the Free Peoples player must exert a companion for each [Dunland] Man you can spot. Skirmish: Exert Saruman to make a [Dunland] Man strength +2.

card.name: Secret Folk
card.property: Plays to your support area. Each time a companion or ally loses a skirmish involving a [Dunland] Man, you may place a [Dunland] token on this card. Maneuver: Discard a Free Peoples possession for each [Dunland] token here (limit 3). Discard this condition.

card.name: Wake of Destruction
card.property: Maneuver: Spot 2 sites you control to make each of your [Dunland] Men fierce until the regroup phase.
The anger of the wild men increased with every home they pillaged.

card.name: War Club
card.property: Bearer must be a [Dunland] Man. Each time bearer wins a skirmish, you may discard 2 Free Peoples possessions.
The wooden weapons of the wild men slew scores of unarmed villagers.

card.name: War Cry of Dunland
card.property: Response: If a [Dunland] Man wins a skirmish, make him fierce and strength +4 until the regroup phase.
”'Death to the Forgoil!'”

card.name: Wild Man of Dunland
card.property: Each time this minion wins a skirmish, you may play a [Dunland] Man from hand; his twilight cost is -2. That Man is fierce and damage +1 until the regroup phase.
”'By our blood… we swear to fight for you….'”

card.name: Wild Man Raid
card.property: Maneuver: Spot 3 [Dunland] Men to discard a Free Peoples possession or condition.
Not even the smallest of trinkets was safe from the destruction of the Dunlendings.

card.name: Wulf
card.property: Fierce. Response: If another [Dunland] Man wins a skirmish, exert Wulf to take control of a site.
”'Do you not hear their voices?'”

card.name: Axe of Erebor
card.property: Bearer must be Gimli. He is damage +1. Skirmish: Discard a [Dwarven] condition or a card stacked on a [Dwarven] condition to make Gimli strength +1.
”'…wherever thou goest my thought goes with thee. But have a care to lay thine axe to the right tree!'”

card.name: Best Company
card.property: Skirmish: Make a Dwarf strength +2 (or +4 if at a battleground).
“An axe swung and swept back. Two Orcs fell headless. The rest fled.”

card.name: Come Here Lad
card.property: Fellowship: Stack the top 2 cards from your draw deck on a [Dwarven] condition that has a card already stacked on it.
”'You are the canniest, luckiest, most reckless fool I've ever met! Bless you.'”

card.name: Courtesy of My Hall
card.property: Plays to your support area. When you play this condition, stack a card from your discard pile here. Fellowship: Discard a Free Peoples card stacked here to heal a Dwarf.
”'Now my guests, come!… Come and take such refreshment as haste allows.'”

card.name: Dwarven Foresight
card.property: Fellowship: Spot a Dwarf to take a Free Peoples card stacked on a [Dwarven] condition into hand.
”'I would guess that the burned bones of the hobbits are now mingled with the Orcs'.'”

card.name: Ever My Heart Rises
card.property: Tale. Plays to your support area. When you play this condition, reveal the top 6 cards of your draw deck and stack them here. Fellowship: Spot a Dwarf and discard the top card of your draw deck to take a Free Peoples card stacked here into hand.

card.name: From the Armory
card.property: Plays to your support area. Skirmish: Exert a Dwarf and stack a Free Peoples card from hand here to prevent all wounds to that Dwarf.
”'It's a bit tight around the chest.'”

card.name: Gimli
card.property: Damage +1. Gimli is strength +1 for each unbound Hobbit companion you can spot.
”'You speak evil of that which is fair beyond the reach of your thought, and only little wit can excuse you.'”

card.name: Gimli
card.property: Damage +1. Skirmish: Exert Gimli to make an unbound companion strength +1 (or +2 if that companion is Legolas).
“But a small dark figure that none had observed sprang out of the shadows”

card.name: Here Is Good Rock
card.property: Tale.Plays to your support area. Skirmish: Stack a Free Peoples card from hand here to make a Dwarf damage +1.
”'Give me a year and a hundred of my kin and I would make this a place that armies would break upon like water.'”

card.name: Khazad Ai-menu
card.property: Skirmish: Make a Dwarf strength +2 (or strength +3 and damage +1 if you spot Legolas).
”'The Orcs are behind the wall. Ai-oi! Come, Legolas! There are enough for both of us.'”

card.name: My Axe Is Notched
card.property: Plays to your support area. Each time Gimli wins a skirmish, place a [Dwarven] token on this card. While you can spot X [Dwarven] tokens on this card and the same number of [Elven] tokens on Final Count, Gimli is strength +X (limit +3).

card.name: Quick As May Be
card.property: Maneuver: Spot a Dwarf companion and an Elf companion to wound a minion.
”'I think, nonetheless, that we no longer need any trail to tell us which way to go.'”

card.name: Rest by Blind Night
card.property: Regroup: Shuffle any number of [Dwarven] conditions (and all cards stacked on them) into your draw deck.
”'And yet even I, Dwarf of many journeys… cannot run all the way to Isengard without any pause….'”

card.name: Restless Axe
card.property: Regroup: Exert a Dwarf to shuffle a [Dwarven] condition (and all cards stacked on it) into your draw deck. Exert a minion for each card shuffled into your draw deck.
”'Give me a row of orc-necks and room to swing and all weariness will fall from me!'”

card.name: Search Far and Wide
card.property: Fellowship: Spot a Dwarf and discard the top card of your draw deck to draw 2 cards.
”'We have been set many riddles since we came to Tol Brandir, but this is the hardest to unravel.'”

card.name: Stout and Strong
card.property: Plays to your support area. Each time a Dwarf wins a skirmish, you may place a [Dwarven] token on this card. Skirmish: Make an unbound companion strength +1 for each [Dwarven] token here (limit +3). Discard this condition.
”'Never did I see an axe so wielded.'”

card.name: Alliance Reforged
card.property: Tale. Fellowship: Draw a card for each Elf companion you spot.
”'If we do not trust the strength of Men, then we trust to the victory of Sauron.'”

card.name: Arrow and Blade
card.property: Skirmish: Exert X Elf companions to make a minion skirmishing an unbound companion strength -X.
The Elven bow and the sword of Man fought together as one weapon.

card.name: Blades Drawn
card.property: To play, spot 3 Elves. Plays to your support area. For each wound on each minion, that minion is strength -2. Discard this condition during the regroup phase.
The sword skills of the Elven archers were unexpected.

card.name: Company of Archers
card.property: Archery: Spot 2 Elf companions to discard a condition.

card.name: Elven Bow
card.property: Bearer must be an Elf. Bearer is an archer.
No finer bows could defend Helm's Deep than those of the Golden Wood.

card.name: Elven Brooch
card.property: To play, spot an Elf. Bearer must be a companion. Response: If another possession borne by bearer is about to be discarded by a Shadow card, discard this possession instead.

card.name: Elven Sword
card.property: Bearer must be an Elf. Skirmish: Exert bearer or discard 2 cards from hand to make a minion skirmishing bearer strength -1.
Fine blades forged by Elven smiths are centuries-old heirlooms.

card.name: Erethon
card.property: To play, spot an Elf. While Erethon bears a ranged weapon, he is strength +1 and damage +1, and he does not add to the fellowship archery total.

card.name: Feathered
card.property: Skirmish: Make a minion skirmishing an Elf strength -2 for each wound on that minion.
Elven swords found the same targets as their arrows.

card.name: Fereveldir
card.property: To play, spot an Elf. Skirmish: Exert Fereveldir and discard an [Elven] token from your condition to wound a minion Fereveldir is skirmishing.
Thandronen

card.name: Ferevellon
card.property: To play, spot an Elf. Skirmish: Exert Ferevellon to make a minion skirmishing him strength -2.
The Uruks at Helm's Deep fell to his blade as easily as Goblins from the mountains.

card.name: Final Count
card.property: Plays to your support area. Each time Legolas wins a skirmish, you may place an [Elven] token on this card. While you can spot X [Elven] tokens on this card and the same number of [Dwarven] tokens on My Axe Is Notched, Legolas is strength +X (limit +3).

card.name: Flashing Steel
card.property: Skirmish: Exert an Elf to make a minion skirmishing that Elf strength -3.
”'Good!… But my count is now two dozen. It has been knife-work up here.'”

card.name: Haldir
card.property: While no opponent controls a site, Haldir is strength +2. Regroup: Exert Haldir at a battleground and exert another Elf to liberate a site.
”'In days of old, my people stood beside the King of Gondor - we come to honor that allegiance.'”

card.name: Killing Field
card.property: To play, spot 3 Elves. Plays to your support area. Each wounded minion is prevented from being fierce. Discard this condition during the regroup phase.
The courage of the defenders blunted the Uruk assaults.

card.name: Legolas
card.property: Archer. The twilight cost of each Shadow event and Shadow condition is +1 for each unbound Hobbit you can spot.
”'They are far, far away…. I know in my heart that they have not rested this night.'”

card.name: Legolas
card.property: Archer. The twilight cost of each Shadow event and Shadow condition is +1 for each unbound Hobbit you can spot.
”'They are far, far away…. I know in my heart that they have not rested this night.'”

card.name: Legolas
card.property: Archer. Skirmish: Exert Legolas to make a minion skirmishing an unbound companion strength -1 (or -2 if that companion is Gimli).
”'Come, you shall sit behind me, friend Gimli.'”

card.name: Lembas
card.property: To play, spot 3 Elves. Bearer must be a companion. Regroup: Discard this possession to reconcile your hand.
“Sam thought that it tasted far better, somehow, than it had for a good while….”

card.name: Lorien Guardian
card.property: Regroup: Exert this companion to make a Shadow player wound a minion.
Haldir's Elven bowmen were experienced defenders of the borders of the Golden Wood

card.name: Lorien Is Most Welcome
card.property: To play, spot 3 Elves. Plays to your support area. Each wounded minion loses all damage bonuses. Discard this condition during the regroup phase.
”'We are proud to fight alongside Men once more….'”

card.name: Lorien Swordsman
card.property: Each minion skirmishing this companion is strength -2 for each wound on that minion.
Long, curved Elven steel cut down Uruks already weakened by Elven arrows.

card.name: Night Without End
card.property: Response: If an Elf wins a skirmish, exert that Elf to liberate a site or wound a minion.
”'Would that this night would end, and I could have better light for shooting.'”

card.name: Ordulus
card.property: To play, spot an Elf. The twilight cost of each ranged weapon played on Ordulus is -1.
Ordulus always has an arrow nocked and a full quiver too.

card.name: Pengedhel
card.property: To play, spot an Elf. While Pengedhel bears a ranged weapon, he is strength +2 and he does not add to the fellowship archery total.
Pengedhel can wield an arrow like a short spear.

card.name: Strength of Arms
card.property: Plays to your support area. Each time an Elf wins a skirmish, you may place an [Elven] token on this card. Skirmish: Make a minion skirmishing an Elf strength -1 for each [Elven] token here (limit -3). Discard this condition.
Elvish weapons were more than a match for the Uruks.

card.name: Supporting Fire
card.property: Skirmish: Make an Elf strength +2 (or +3 if you spot 3 Elf companions).
Sword-work is made easier with archery support.

card.name: Sword-wall
card.property: Skirmish or Regroup: Spot 3 Elf companions to liberate a site or exert a minion.
A fixed line of Elven blades can hold off great numbers of the Enemy's hordes.

card.name: Thandronen
card.property: To play, spot an Elf. Regroup: Exert Thandronen to discard a minion stacked on a condition or stacked on a site.
The twin sons of Thandronen marched with their father to defend Helm's Deep.

card.name: Thonnas
card.property: To play, spot an Elf. While Thonnas bears a ranged weapon, each minion skirmishing him is strength -2 and Thonnas does not add to the fellowship archery total.

card.name: Valor
card.property: Skirmish: Make an Elf strength +2 (or +3 if skirmishing a wounded minion).
An Elf avoids taking up arms, but once committed to the fray, his will is resolute.

card.name: Behold the White Rider
card.property: Plays to your support area. Each time Gandalf wins a skirmish, you may place a [Gandalf] token here. Skirmish: Wound a minion skirmishing Gandalf for each [Gandalf] token here. Discard this condition.
”'Gandalf is come again.'”

card.name: Gandalf
card.property: Fellowship: If the twilight pool has fewer than 2 twilight tokens, add (2) to play a character from your discard pile.
”'Dangerous!… And so am I, very dangerous; more dangerous than anything you will ever meet….'”

card.name: Gandalf
card.property: While you can spot 3 twilight tokens, Gandalf is strength +3.
”'Behold, I am not Gandalf the Grey, whom you betrayed. I am Gandalf the White, who has returned from death.'”

card.name: Gandalf
card.property: While you can spot 3 twilight tokens, Gandalf is strength +3.
”'Behold, I am not Gandalf the Grey, whom you betrayed. I am Gandalf the White, who has returned from death.'”

card.name: Gandalf's Staff
card.property: Bearer must be Gandalf. While you can spot 2 twilight tokens, Gandalf is damage +2.
”'The staff in the hand of a Wizard may be more than a prop for age….'”

card.name: Grown Suddenly Tall
card.property: Spell. Fellowship: Spot Gandalf to discard all conditions.
“His hood and grey rags were flung away. His white garments shone.”

card.name: Have Patience
card.property: Fellowship: Spot Gandalf to heal an unbound companion twice.
”'Go where you must go, and hope!'”

card.name: Hearken to Me
card.property: Spell. To play, spot Gandalf. Bearer must be Theoden. Discard all Shadow conditions on Theoden. Shadow conditions may not be played on Theoden.
”'Not all is dark. Take courage, Lord of the Mark; for better help you will not find.'”

card.name: Into Dark Tunnels
card.property: Spell. Response: If you play a [Gandalf] event, exert Gandalf twice to place that event in your hand instead of your discard pile.
”'Even Sauron knows them not. They are older than he. Now I have walked there, but I will bring no report to darken the light of day.'”

card.name: Keep Your Forked Tongue
card.property: Skirmish: Spot Gandalf and 3 twilight tokens to prevent all wounds to a companion who has the Gandalf signet.
”'A witless worm you have become.'”

card.name: Long I Fell
card.property: Spell. Skirmish: Spot Gandalf to prevent all wounds to him. Any Shadow player may make you wound a minion to prevent this.
”'His fire was about me. I was burned.'”

card.name: Mithrandir, Mithrandir!
card.property: Spell. Maneuver: Exert Gandalf to wound each minion who has strength of 6 or less.
“The wild men fell on their faces before him.”

card.name: Roll of Thunder
card.property: Fellowship or Maneuver: Spot Gandalf to discard a Shadow possession or Shadow artifact.
”'I have not passed through fire and death to bandy crooked words with a serving-man till the lightning falls.'”

card.name: Shadowfax
card.property: Bearer must be Gandalf. Discard any hand weapon he bears. Gandalf may not bear a hand weapon. At the start of each skirmish involving Gandalf, each minion skirmishing him must exert.
”'He is the chief of the Mearas, lords of horses….'”

card.name: Shadowfax
card.property: Bearer must be Gandalf. Discard any hand weapon he bears. Gandalf may not bear a hand weapon. At the start of each skirmish involving Gandalf, each minion skirmishing him must exert.
”'He is the chief of the Mearas, lords of horses….'”

card.name: Stump and Bramble
card.property: Maneuver: Spot an [Isengard] minion and an Ent ally. Until the regroup phase, that ally is damage +2 and participates in archery fire and skirmishes.
”'Many of those trees were my friends… many had voices of their own that are lost for ever now.'”

card.name: Task Was Not Done
card.property: Spell. Regroup: Exert Gandalf to discard up to 2 wounded minions.
”'Naked I was sent back - for a brief time, until my task is done. And naked I lay upon the mountain-top.'”

card.name: Treebeard
card.property: Unhasty. Response: If an unbound Hobbit is about to be discarded, stack him here instead. Fellowship: Exert Treebeard and add(1) to play an unbound Hobbit stacked here.
”'Do not be hasty, that is my motto.'”

card.name: Treebeard
card.property: Unhasty. Response: If an unbound Hobbit is about to be discarded, stack him here instead. Fellowship: Exert Treebeard and add (1) to play an unbound Hobbit stacked here.
”'Do not be hasty, that is my motto.'”

card.name: Treebeard
card.property: Unhasty. Fellowship: Exert Treebeard and discard an unbound companion from hand to heal an unbound companion.
”'No, I am not tired. I do not easily get tired. And I do not sit down. I am not very, hm, bendable.'”

card.name: Under the Living Earth
card.property: Skirmish: Make Gandalf strength +1 for each twilight token you spot (limit +5).
”'Thither I came at last, to the uttermost foundations of stone. He was with me still.'”

card.name: Well Met Indeed
card.property: Fellowship: Spot an Elf, a [Gondor] Man, and a Dwarf to play Gandalf from your dead pile.
”'And what may you be doing in these parts? An Elf, a Man, and a Dwarf, all clad in elvish fashion.'”

card.name: Windows in a Stone Wall
card.property: To play, exert an Ent. Plays on that Ent. Response: If an [Isengard] minion is killed, discard this condition to reveal the top 10 cards of an opponent's draw deck. Discard 1 Shadow card and 1 Free Peoples card revealed. Your opponent reshuffles that deck.

card.name: Wizardry Indeed
card.property: Maneuver: If you can spot more minions than companions, exert Gandalf to make an opponent discard a minion.
“The hosts of Isengard roared, swaying this way and that, turning from fear to fear.”

card.name: Aragorn
card.property: Defender +1.
”'Sauron fears you, Aragorn, he fears what you may become.'”

card.name: Arrows Thick in the Air
card.property: Archery or Skirmish: Exert 2 Ring-bound Men to wound each roaming minion.
“He came to rest in the fern a few feet away, face downward, green arrow-feathers sticking from his neck below a golden collar.”

card.name: Boromir
card.property: Bearer must be Faramir. Skirmish: Discard a [Gondor] card from hand to make a Ringbound Man strength +1.
”'Where is thy horn? Whither goest thou? O Boromir! But he was gone.'”

card.name: Boromir's Gauntlets
card.property: Bearer must be a [Gondor] Man. Skirmish: Exert bearer to cancel a skirmish involving bearer. Any Shadow player may remove (1) to prevent this.
”'…now Boromir has taken his road, and we must make haste to choose our own.'”

card.name: Curse Them
card.property: Skirmish: Exert a Ring-bound Man to cancel a skirmish involving a roaming minion.
”'It is close on ten leagues hence to the eastshore of Anduin… and we seldom come so far afield.'”

card.name: Damrod
card.property: Ring-bound. Ranger. To play, spot a Ring-bound Man. Skirmish: Exert Damrod to exhaust a Man he is skirmishing.
”'I doubt not that the days of Gondor are numbered, and the walls of Minas Tirith are doomed, so great is His strength and malice.'”

card.name: Defend It and Hope

card.property: Easterling. Fierce. Skirmish: Spot 2 burdens and remove (2) to make an Easterling strength +2. Skirmish: Spot 4 burdens and remove (2) to make an Easterling strength +3. Skirmish: Spot 6 burdens and remove (2) to make an Easterling strength +4.

card.name: Easterling Guard

card.name: Easterling Infantry

card.name: Flanking Attack

card.property: Southron. Ambush (2).

card.name: King's Room
card.property: When the fellowship moves to King's Room without a [Rohan] companion, each unbound companion must exert.

card.name: Ring of Isengard
card.property: Shadow: Play a [Dunland] minion to draw a card.

card.name: Wizard's Vale
card.property: At the start of the first Shadow phase, if the twilight pool has fewer than 9 twilight tokens, add (4) (limit once per turn).

card.name: Fortress of Orthanc
card.property: Battleground. The Shadow number of Fortress of Orthanc is +2 for each companion over 4.

card.name: Orthanc Balcony
card.property: Battleground. Shadow: Play Saruman from your discard pile; his twilight cost is -2.

card.name: Orthanc Library
card.property: When the fellowship moves to Orthanc Library, each Shadow player may draw a card for each companion over 4.

card.name: Palantir Chamber
card.property: Shadow: Remove 2 burdens to play a minion from your discard pile.

card.name: Aragorn
card.property: Ranger. Each time the fellowship moves, you may wound a minion for each unbound Hobbit you spot.

card.name: Theoden
card.property: Fellowship: Play a [Rohan] possession on a [Rohan] companion to heal that companion (limit once per turn).
”'Every man and strong lad able to bear arms, all who have horses, let them be ready in the saddle at the gate ere the second hour from noon!'”

card.name: Legolas
card.property: Archer. The twilight cost of each Shadow event and Shadow condition is +1 for each unbound Hobbit you can spot.
